name: Triassic Park
description:
For Ludum Dare 41: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

You're in charge of the night shift at Triassic Park. It's up to you to make sure the dinosaurs are fed and watered, their enclosures are kept clean, they don't break down the fences, and they don't disembowel you.

You have the following tools at your disposal:

  • Dinosaur Feed: A big juicy steak.
  • Dinosaur Juice: Not made from dinosaurs, but they love it.
  • Poopy-Scoopy: No-one thought to toilet-train them.
  • Lure 'em Away: No dinosaur can resist a blue sphere.
  • Fence Repair Kit 3K: Magically re-materialises all kinds of chain-link.

If you can survive until the morning, you win the game!
